job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: Would you like to join an award-winning company which is changing and building the future telecom, providing ALL-G cloud-native OpenRAN portfolio in their best-in-class products? Read on if your answer is YES.  My client a world leading Telco vendor is currently seeking a Sr. Layer2/3 Stack SW Engineer, with 7+ years of C/C++ development of embedded /real-time components and good understanding of 5G/LTE standard exposure to help expand my clients offering across the globe. This is a great opportunity to join an organization dedicated to its customer base through its desire to deliver disruptive Radio products.  What you MUST bring to the team:  •	[MUST] 7 plus years’ experience in C/C++ programming language development of embedded/real-time components of a multi-threaded system. •	Possess strong foundation in troubleshooting and debugging activities in end-to-end software development cycle. •	Ability to work independently without close supervision and act as a part of a global team in a multi-site organization. •	Demonstrates good understanding of communication protocols.  Ability to translate L2/L3 standards and specifications towards efficient implementation. •	Solid hands-on experience with SW development methodologies: Design documentation, SW implementation, unit testing, etc. •	Essential to have strong communication skills. •	[MUST] B.Sc in Computer Science / Computer Engineering or top IDF SW development unit.    Nice to have: •	Experience in Linux OS user application development. •	Past experience with telecom communication standards (preferable 4G/5G). •	Past experience with Containers/dockers/Kubernetes (K8S) technologies •	Experienced with RAN associated test equipment's such as UE simulators/QXDM •	Experience with cellular modems – design, implementation, etc.
